plot: Alex is still in love with ex-boyfriend, Zack. So when he discovers that Zack has undergone a 12-step program to "convert" to heterosexuality he decides to win Zack back.
title: A Thing of the Past
plot_es: Alex is still in love with ex-boyfriend, Zack. So when he discovers that Zack has undergone a 12-step program to "convert" to heterosexuality he decides to win Zack back.
plot_en: Alex is still in love with ex-boyfriend, Zack. So when he discovers that Zack has undergone a 12-step program to "convert" to heterosexuality he decides to win Zack back.
